long_description: The Shimano 105 FD-5700 10-speed front derailleur leverages the wide inner link design introduced at the Dura-Ace level to assertively move the chain. Improved chain guide shape and wide inner link design combine for silky smooth, seamless shifting, even under the heaviest of loads. Comes in clamp sizes 28.6/31.8mm and 34.9mm, and a braze-on model. For use with a double-chainring crankset.
short_description: The Shimano 105 FD-5700 10-speed front derailleur leverages the wide inner link design introduced at the Dura-Ace level to assertively move the chain.
